src:
Umorili Ronaldovega frizerja
Ricardo Marques Ferreira je umrl v hotelski sobi. Policija prijela 39-letnega brazilskega državljana.
04 Nov 2019, 19:44 by E. B.
ZURICH – Na strahoten prizor je naletela sobarica v hotelu v züriški četrti Albisrieden: Ricardo Marques Ferreira, ki so ga prijatelji in znanci klicali Caju, je ležal v mlaki krvi, morilec ga je večkrat usodno zabodel z nožem, se je izkazalo. Žrtev je sloviti stilist in vizažist, svojo podobo naj bi mu večkrat zaupal tudi portugalski nogometni as Cristiano Ronaldo.Ferreira, star je bil 40 let, je oblikoval pričeske tudi slovitim portugalskim fotomodelom in igralkam, po številnih namigovanjih pa mu svet droge in podzemlje nista bila tuja, zato policija ne izključuje možnosti, da jo je skupil v brutalnem obračunu. V sobi je prevladoval močan vonj po alkoholu, Caju, ki je že dve leti živel v Švici, pa je v hotelu v neugledni soseski, kjer so doma kriminal, preprodaja mamil in prostitucija, že teden dni bival zaradi poslovnih sestankov. Kdo naj bi bili sogovorniki, ni znano, prav tako ni jasno, ali naj bi ga prav kateri od teh zabodel, policija pa je po pregledu kraja zločina prijela neznanega 39-letnika, domnevno brazilskega državljana. Da je šlo za nasilen obračun, so potrdile priče, ki naj bi na hrup iz sobe večkrat opozorile uslužbence na recepciji.Sloviti frizer se je rodil na portugalskem otoku Madeira, tako kakor Ronaldo, za podobo nogometnega zvezdnika naj bi skrbel tudi pred fotografiranjem za naslovnice uglednih revij. Ronaldo, ki po nekaterih poročanjih že dlje ni bil Ferreirova stranka, tragičnega dogodka še ni komentiral.

Murdered Ronald's hairdresser
Ricardo Marques Ferreira died in a hotel room. Police apprehend a 39-year-old Brazilian.
04 Nov 2019, 19:44 by E. B.
ZURICH - A maid at a hotel in the Zurich neighborhood of Albisrieden came across a terrifying scene: Ricardo Marques Ferreira, who was called Caju by friends and acquaintances, was lying in lukewarm blood, the killer stabbing him several times with a knife. The victim is a renowned stylist and makeup artist, allegedly repeatedly entrusted to him by Portuguese football ace Cristiano Ronaldo.Ferreira, 40 years old, also designed hairstyles for famous Portuguese fashion models and actresses, and according to numerous hints the world of drugs and the underground was not his foreign, so the police do not rule out the possibility that he was bundled up in a brutal showdown. The room was dominated by a strong odor of alcohol, and Caju, who had lived in Switzerland for two years, had been staying in a hotel in an unsightly neighborhood of crime, drug trafficking and prostitution for a week for business meetings. It is not known who the interviewees are, nor is it clear if any of them were stabbed, and police have apprehended an unknown 39-year-old, allegedly a Brazilian, after examining the crime scene. The violent showdown was confirmed by witnesses, who were repeatedly warned by staff at the reception desk. The famed hairdresser was born on the Portuguese island of Madeira, just like Ronaldo.
